name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine thanks the audience after the song performance.
Announcement of the 'Sweet Tonjok Hoodie' merchandise.
Announcement of a new original song by Pavolia Reine.
Closing MC and farewell message to the fans.

subtitles.original: ...にして二人きりなら
subtitles.english: ...if it's just the two of us...

subtitles.original: 強く生き続けることを称えよう
subtitles.english: Let's celebrate our strength to keep on living.

subtitles.original: 優しい私は昼の祝い
subtitles.english: The gentle me is a blessing of the day.

subtitles.original: さよならは必要ないから
subtitles.english: Because there's no need for goodbyes...

subtitles.original: 構わないでね
subtitles.english: ...don't worry about me.

subtitles.original: いつか戻るから
subtitles.english: Because I'll return someday.

subtitles.original: 正直な気持ち知って　私をもっと止めて
subtitles.english: Knowing my honest feelings, stop me even more.

subtitles.original: 曖昧にしないで　他は要らないでしょ
subtitles.english: Don't be vague, you don't need anyone else, right?

subtitles.original: 心繋がる場所で　強く感じたら
subtitles.english: If you feel it strongly in the place where our hearts connect...

subtitles.original: 声を枯らしてでも
subtitles.english: Even if your voice goes hoarse...

subtitles.original: 心臓で叫べ
subtitles.english: ...scream with your heart!

subtitles.original: 今更恋しいなんて思わない
subtitles.english: I won't think I miss you now.

subtitles.original: 愛してるなんて言わないわ
subtitles.english: I won't say I love you.

subtitles.original: 代わりは誰もいないから
subtitles.english: Because there's no one else like you.

subtitles.original: 熱く燃える炎を通して
subtitles.english: Through the hotly burning flames...

subtitles.original: 騒がしい夜の中　二人だけの世界で踊ろう
subtitles.english: In the noisy night, let's dance in a world just for the two of us.

subtitles.original: 邪魔するものは何もないわ
subtitles.english: There's nothing to stand in our way.

subtitles.original: さよならは言わせないからね
subtitles.english: I won't let you say goodbye.

subtitles.original: 心地好い夢へ
subtitles.english: Into a pleasant dream...

subtitles.original: 続く Illusion Night
subtitles.english: ...the Illusion Night continues.

subtitles.original: まだまだ終わらない Showtime
subtitles.english: The showtime isn't over yet.

subtitles.original: ほら踊り明かそうや
subtitles.english: Come on, let's dance the night away.

subtitles.original: クラクラしちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: Until we get dizzy...

subtitles.original: 弾けてね
subtitles.english: ...let's have a blast!

subtitles.original: Whoo! Thank you so much for today everybody!
subtitles.english: Whoo! Thank you so much for today everybody!

subtitles.original: みんな今日は本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for today, everyone!

subtitles.original: But...
subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.original: Ah, so yeah, that was Illusion Night.
subtitles.english: Ah, so yeah, that was Illusion Night.

subtitles.original: And how did you like the collab song? Whoo! The duo! Nice.
subtitles.english: And how did you like the collab song? Whoo! The duo! Nice.

subtitles.original: Oh, and before I end things, I have an announcement.
subtitles.english: Oh, and before I end things, I have an announcement.

subtitles.original: そうですね、最後はアナウンスメントがありますね。
subtitles.english: That's right, there's an announcement at the end.

subtitles.original: グッズ！Merch! グッズがあります！
subtitles.english: Merch! Merch! We have merch!

subtitles.original: まずは、こちらですね！
subtitles.english: First, here it is!

subtitles.original: Yay! Whoo! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Yay! Whoo! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: Sweet Tonjok Hoodie!
subtitles.english: Sweet Tonjok Hoodie!

subtitles.original: Sweet Tonjok Hoodie
subtitles.english: Sweet Tonjok Hoodie

subtitles.original: Sweet Tonjok Hoodie, a hoodie just for you.
subtitles.english: Sweet Tonjok Hoodie, a hoodie just for you.

subtitles.original: Well, look at that! The front part, the front part...
subtitles.english: Well, look at that! The front part, the front part...

subtitles.original: ...there's an illustration by Yomozaka-sensei!
subtitles.english: ...there's an illustration by Yomozaka-sensei!

subtitles.original: And look at the sides, look at this!
subtitles.english: And look at the sides, look at this!

subtitles.original: Sleeve design has "Salam Merahyats"!
subtitles.english: Sleeve design has "Greetings, Merahyats"!

subtitles.original: Perfect for the Merahyats who want to have a Tonjok identity! Pew-pew-pew-pew-pew-pew!
subtitles.english: Perfect for the Merahyats who want to have a Tonjok identity! Pew-pew-pew-pew-pew-pew!

subtitles.original: The size of the hoodie is one-size-fits-all, so you don't have to worry about size...
subtitles.english: The size of the hoodie is one-size-fits-all, so you don't have to worry about size...

subtitles.original: ...and the material is cotton. Yummy yummy.
subtitles.english: ...and the material is cotton. Yummy yummy.

subtitles.original: Ah, and the goods will not be on sale immediately...
subtitles.english: Ah, and the goods will not be on sale immediately...

subtitles.original: ...it will be on sale in the Holoro 3D collaboration on July 29th.
subtitles.english: ...it will be on sale in the Holoro 3D collaboration on July 29th.

subtitles.original: グッズは、7月29日にセール始まります。
subtitles.english: The merch will go on sale on July 29th.

subtitles.original: いえーい、楽しみにしててね！
subtitles.english: Yay, look forward to it!

subtitles.original: And, I also have a very big announcement to share.
subtitles.english: And, I also have a very big announcement to share.

subtitles.original: そう、えー、大切なお知らせがあります。
subtitles.english: Yes, I have an important announcement.

subtitles.original: Then, take a look!
subtitles.english: Then, take a look!

subtitles.original: PAVOLIA REINE
subtitles.english: PAVOLIA REINE

subtitles.original: NEW ORIGINAL SONG
subtitles.english: NEW ORIGINAL SONG

subtitles.original: Produced by MARDIAL
subtitles.english: Produced by MARDIAL

subtitles.original: Pavolia Reine's first ENGLISH X INDONESIAN ORIGINAL SONG
subtitles.english: Pavolia Reine's first ENGLISH X INDONESIAN ORIGINAL SONG

subtitles.original: COMING SOON
subtitles.english: COMING SOON

subtitles.original: はい！そう皆さん、楽しみにしててね！
subtitles.english: Yes! So everyone, look forward to it!

subtitles.original: And don't forget to tweet with the hashtag #PavoliaReine3D...
subtitles.english: And don't forget to tweet with the hashtag #PavoliaReine3D...

subtitles.original: ...ご感想 waiting, waiting しますね！
subtitles.english: ...I'll be waiting for your thoughts!

subtitles.original: Please tweet dengan hashtag ini!
subtitles.english: Please tweet with this hashtag!

subtitles.original: And so, we've reached the end of the night.
subtitles.english: And so, we've reached the end of the night.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much everybody for watching Pavolia Reine's 3D showcase!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much everybody for watching Pavolia Reine's 3D showcase!

subtitles.original: 見てくれて、本当にありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for watching!

subtitles.original: それじゃ、えー...
subtitles.english: Well then...

subtitles.original: ...We say, SALAM MERAHYATS!
subtitles.english: ...We say, SALAM MERAHYATS!

subtitles.original: Bye bye! Yay!
subtitles.english: Bye bye! Yay!
